response.original_title: Françoise (Il y eut un soir... il y eut un matin)
response.overview: Françoise is a talented designer. Her boss does not underestimate her talent and seeks to give her a chance, though is Françoise right to live outside of her home? Shouldn't she return to her husband and child?
response.title: Francoise (There Was One Evening ... There Was One Morning)
